title: Open-sourcing AudioCraft: Generative AI for audio
dot:
digraph AudioCraft{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];edge[fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];subgraph cluster_main{label="AudioCraft: Generative AI for Audio";style=filled;color=lightgrey; subgraph cluster_models{label="AudioCraft Models";style=filled;color=white;MusicGen[label="MusicGen
Generates music from text-based inputs"];AudioGen[label="AudioGen
Generates sound effects from text-based inputs"];EnCodec[label="EnCodec
Compresses and reconstructs audio signals"];}subgraph cluster_use_cases{label="Use Cases";style=filled;color=white;musician[label="Musician
Explore new compositions without playing an instrument"];game_dev[label="Indie Game Developer

from Raw Audio"];autoregressive_model[label="Autoregressive Language Model
for Audio Tokens"];high_quality_audio[label="High-Quality Audio Generation
with Long-Term Consistency"];}subgraph cluster_future{label="Future Developments";style=filled;color=white;new_approaches[label="New Approaches
for Synthesized Audio"];better_control[label="Better Controllability
for Generative Models"];longer_dependencies[label="Capture Longer Range Dependencies"];bias_investigation[label="Investigate Limitations and Biases"];}MusicGen->musician[label="Inspires"];AudioGen->game_dev[label="Enables"];EnCodec->business_owner[label="Simplifies"];raw_audio->discrete_tokens;discrete_tokens->autoregressive_model;autoregressive_model->high_quality_audio;high_quality_audio->MusicGen;high_quality_audio->AudioGen;high_quality_audio->EnCodec;new_approaches->better_control;better_control->longer_dependencies;longer_dependencies->bias_investigation;}subgraph cluster_recommended_reads{label="Recommended Reads";style=filled;color=lightgrey;cm3leon[label="CM3leon
